name: Petyr Baelish
bio: Popularly called Littlefinger, a skilled manipulator and uses his ownership of brothels in King's Landing to both accrue intelligence on political rivals and acquire vast wealth.

name: Yohn Royce
bio: Lord of Runestone, where he fosters Robin Arryn, and a powerful bannerman of House Arryn.

name: Robin Arryn
bio: Still being breastfed by his mother, despite approaching his teens, and takes a sick delight in seeing people thrown from the Eyrieês Moon Door.

name: Marei
bio: A prostitute in the King's Landing brothel owned by Petyr "Littlefinger" Baelish.

name: Ramsay Bolton
bio: Sadistic bastard son of Roose Bolton, recently legitimized and thus, lawful heir to Winterfell and the North

name: Roose Bolton
bio: Lord of Dreadfort, current King of the North after usurping the position from House Stark.

name: Walda Bolton
bio: She is the new wife of Roose Bolton, the Lord of the Dreadfort. During the wedding feast of Edmure Tully and Roslin Frey, Lord Bolton recounts to Catelyn Stark and Ser Brynden "Blackfish" Tully how Lord Walder Frey proposed that he marry one of his granddaughters and offered her weight in silver as a dowry. Lord Bolton then adds he chose the fattest bride available, which has made him very rich.

name: Theon Greyjoy
bio: Only living son and heir of Lord Balon Greyjoy of the Iron Islands. Currently slave to Ramsay Bolton after exensive torture.

name: Yara Greyjoy
bio: Fierce Ironborn warrior commanding her own longship, Theon Greyjoy's older sister and only surviving sibling

name: Balon Greyjoy
bio: Hard, ambitious, and ruthless Lord Reaper of Pyke and head of House Greyjoy. Father of Theon and Yara Grejoy.

name: Euron Greyjoy
bio: Euron is the younger brother of King Balon Greyjoy, older brother of Aeron Greyjoy, and the eldest uncle of Theon and Yara Greyjoy.

name: The Night's King
bio: Leader of the White Walkers. He was a fearless warrior named the thirteenth Lord Commander of the Night's Watch. (Later he fell in love with a woman “with skin as white as the moon and eyes like blue stars”, he chased her and loved her though “her skin was cold as ice,” and when he gave his seed to her he gave his soul as well. He brought her back to the Nightfort and after the unholy union, he declared himself king and her his queen, and ruled the Nightfort as his own castle for thirteen years.)

name: Melisandre
bio: Beautiful sorceress serves mysterious deity the Lord of Light and wields a variety of dubious magical powers. Fell in loe with a woman "with skin as white as the moon and eyes like blue stars", chasing her though "her skin was cold as ice", and when he gave his seed to her he gave his soul as well

name: Jaqen H'ghar
bio: An assumed identity of one of the Faceless Men of Braavos, a feared order of mysterious assassins with the ability to change their appearance at will. After the Jaqen persona is of no more use to him, the Faceless Man shapeshifts into a new appearance and tells Arya he will train her to be a Faceless Man if she goes with him. Eventually, Arya travels to Braavos to look for Jaqen and finds him, and he trains her.

name: Arya Stark
bio: Arya Stark is the youngest daughter and third child of Lady Catelyn and Lord Eddard Stark. Serving Jaqen H'qar at the House of Black and White to become one of the faceless assassins. Currently blind.

name: Three Eyed Raven
bio: Under the guise of a three-eyed raven, he appears in Bran Stark's vision-dreams, following his fall and injury, prompting his quest beyond the Wall and guiding him to the cave in which his real human body resides.

name: The Waif
bio: The Waif is an acolyte of the Faceless Men serving in the House of Black and White in Braavos.

name: Thoros
bio: Thoros is a red priest of the Lord of Light and a noted warrior. Raised to become a Red Priest, though he grew up a gluttonous and lustful man, constantly raiding the kitchens and taking girls to his chambers.

name: Izembaro
bio: Izembaro is the manager of a Braavosi troupe of actors, in which he also acts. Larger-than-life, he specializes in portraying drunken aristocrats. Huge presence on stage and rather nasty to his company when off-stage.

name: Kinvara
bio: Kinvara is a Red Priestess, one of the high-ranking leaders in the religion of R'hllor, the Lord of Light. Her full title is "High Priestess of the Red Temple of Volantis, the Flametruth, the Light of Wisdom, and First Servant of the Lord of Light".

name: Cersei Lannister
bio: Malicious Queen Regent.

name: Jaime Lannister
bio: A knight of the Kingsguard, the eldest son of Tywin Lannister, younger twin brother of Queen Cersei Lannister, and older brother of Tyrion Lannister. Previously he served in the Kingsguard of Aerys II Targaryen and, infamously, betrayed and killed Aerys during the Sack of King's Landing, earning him the sobriquet "Kingslayer". Jaime is involved in an incestuous sexual relationship with Cersei, and, unknown to most, is the biological father of her three children, Joffrey, Myrcella and Tommen.

name: Tommen Baratheon
bio: Publicly, the youngest son of Kind Robert Baratheon and Queen Cersei Lannister, Tommen is good-natured and passive in contrast to his brother Joffrey, who sometimes bullied Tommen for amusement.  Like his sister, he is fond of his uncle Tyrion Lannister.

name: Bronn
bio: Bronn is a skilled and dangerous sellsword who comes to prominence when he champions for Tyrion Lannister in his trial by combat in the Eyrie. Poisoned by Tyene Sand and almost dies, but survives and is allowed to leave Dorne.

name: Qyburn
bio: He is an unethical former maester who was thrown out of the order for conducting illegal human experimentation. While his unethical experiments have led to him being reviled, they also made him arguably one of the most talented healers in all of Westeros.

name: Gregor Clegane
bio: He is the head of House Clegane, the older brother of Sandor Clegane, and a notoriously fearsome warrior with a tendency toward extreme violence. Due to his freakishly huge size, he is called "The Mountain That Rides" or more so often simply "The Mountain".

name: Kevan Lannister
bio: Kevan is the younger brother of Lord Tywin Lannister and one of his most loyal and trusted officers in the Lannister armies during the War of the Five Kings, respected for his wise and candid counsel. After his brother's death at the hands of his nephew Tyrion, Kevan opposes his niece Cersei's seizure of power as leader of her son King Tommen's Small Council, and leaves for Casterly Rock. When Cersei is arrested on various charges by the Faith Militant, Kevan returns to King's Landing and is appointed Hand of the King

name: Pycelle
bio: Grand Maester. Member of the King's Council. Uses his old age and meek demeanour as a cloak to mask a sharp intellect and scheming nature which has allowed him to survive three kings.

name: Shae
bio: Shae is a prostitute who has begun an exclusive relationship with Tyrion Lannister during the time when he was fighting in the Lannister army as part of the Vanguard during the Battle of the Green Fork.

name: Myrcella Baratheon
bio: Commonly thought to be the only daughter of King Robert Baratheon and Queen Cersei Lannister. Cersei and Robert married to seal a political alliance between House Baratheon and House Lannister after Robert took the throne by force from the Mad King Aerys II Targaryen

name: Ellaria Sand
bio: Obara Sand is the eldest of the "Sand Snakes", the eight bastard daughters of Prince Oberyn Martell, and was named in honor of her father. Her mother was a peasant.

name: Obara Sand
bio: The eldest of the "Sand Snakes", eight bastard daughters of Oberyn Martell. Even more than her sisters, Obara inherited her father's martial prowess, particularly his skill with a spear, and charges head-on into a situation, relying on brute strength.

name: Doran Martell
bio: Prince of Dorne and the Lord of Sunspear. He is the head of House Martell, the ruling house of Dorne, and the older brother of the late Princess Elia, who was murdered by Ser Gregor Clegane in the Sack of King's Landing, and Prince Oberyn, known as The Red Viper, also killed by Clegane. He suffers from a severe case of gout, which mostly prevents him from walking and restricts him to a wheelchair

name: Nymeria Sand
bio: The second of the eight bastard daughters of Prince Oberyn Martell, known as the "Sand Snakes". Very skilled with using her 8 foot long bullwhip in combat. Nymeria inherited her father's cunning, and is the most observant and calculating of the Sand Snakes.

name: Areo Hotah
bio: Captain of the Martell guard and the personal bodyguard of Prince Doran Martell, the ruler of Dorne. Renowned for his skill with the halberd.

name: Tyene Sand
bio: Tyene Sand is the third of the eight bastard daughters of Prince Oberyn Martell, known as the "Sand Snakes". She is also his eldest daughter by his paramour, Ellaria Sand. Tyene fights using a pair of long daggers, though her other signature weapon is coating blades with lethal poisons - a tactic she learned from her father.

name: Trystane Martell
bio: The youngest son of Prince Doran Martell, Lord of Sunspear and Prince of Dorne. Like his father Doran, Trystane lacks (for the most part) the hotheadedness typical of Dornishmen, as evidenced by his showing mercy to Bronn for attacking him.

name: Tyrion Lannister
bio: Tyrion Lannister is the youngest son of Lord Tywin Lannister and younger brother of Cersei and Jaime Lannister. A dwarf, he uses his wit and intellect to overcome the prejudice he faces.

name: Varys
bio: Varys is a eunuch and was the Master of Whisperers on the King's Small Council until he is forced to flee King's Landing with Tyrion Lannister. He is a skilled manipulator and commands a network of informants across two continents. Varys' true loyalties are eventually revealed to be to Daenerys Targaryen (though she herself is initially unaware of this), as he believes her rule would be the best way to preserve peace and prosperity in the Seven Kingdoms. He and Tyrion travel to Meereen in the hopes of serving as her advisers.

name: Grey Worm
bio: The chosen commander of the Unsullied, the warrior-eunuchs of Astapor whose reputation for combat is without equal.

name: Missandei
bio: A slave who served as an interpreter to the masters of Astapor, Missandei was freed by Daenerys and now serves as her trusted advisor and Handmaiden. After Daenerys flees Meereen on the back of her dragon Drogon, Missandei remains in the city as part of her Small Council along with Tyrion Lannister and Grey Worm while Jorah Mormont and Daario Naharis search for the missing queen.

name: The High Sparrow
bio: The High Sparrow is the leader of the religious sect known as the Sparrows and the newly appointed High Septon.Although the High Sparrow seems a harmless old man, he has a will of steel. His pious devotion is genuine and deep-rooted, hiding no ulterior political motives. As a result, he cannot be bribed or easily intimidated.

name: Davos Seaworth
bio: Davos is a landed knight, and a former smuggler who was in the service of Stannis Baratheon, Lord of Dragonstone and claimant to the Iron Throne, whom he serves as Hand of the King.

name: Walder Frey
bio: Joined forces with the Lannisters and Roose Bolton to betray the Starks, and presided over the gruesome bloodbath of the Red Wedding with palpable glee.

name: Yezzan zo Qaggaz
bio: A slave-trader from the city of Meereen, on the coast of Slaver's Bay, and one of the Great Masters, the former ruling elite of the city. Purchases and trains pit fighters.

name: Lancel
bio: Served as a squire for King Robert Baratheon until he was elevated to knighthood, but after sustaining heavy injuries during the Battle of the Blackwater, he joins the religious movement known as Sparrows and abandons his family name, after which he is simply known as Brother Lancel.

name: Unella
bio: Unella is a Septa of the Faith of the Seven and a devoted follower of the High Sparrow. She was in charge of coercing Cersei to "confess".

name: Lothar Frey
bio: Lothar is a son of Walder Frey, the Lord of the Crossing. He is the steward of the Twins, managing the day-to-day running of the castle. He often plans and organizes the fine details to achieve his father's goals.

name: Razdal mo Eraz
bio: Razdal mo Eraz is a wealthy Yunkish slave-trader, one of the Wise Masters, the ruling elite of the city. Razdal is not a braggart, but shrewd and politically savvy. A reserved, calculating man, he is capable of being polite when it is politically expedient.

name: Walder Rivers
bio: Known as "Black Walder" for his temper and demeanor. He is a bastard son of his namesake Lord Walder Frey, Lord of the Crossing and head of House Frey. Murdered Catelyn Stark.

name: Jon Snow
bio: The bastard son of Lord Eddard Stark of Winterfell. He was a steward in the Night's Watch. Served on the Wall as Lord Commander, Jon has found a place of acceptance where the circumstances of his birth are of little importance. Serving as Lord Commander, he was stabbed 'to death' in a mutiny.

name: Tormund Giantsbane
bio: He is a renowned leader and raider among the Free Folk and second in command behind Mance Rayder. After Mance's death, Jon Snow, releases Tormund and asks him to help win over the remaining wildlings into an alliance against the White Walkers. Tormund is present at the massacre at Hardhome, where he fights against the army of the dead.

name: Alliser Thorne
bio: Castle Black's master-of-arms and a literal Thorne in Jon Snow's side from the moment he arrived at the Wall. Thorne was the first to stab Jon and leave him for dead.

name: Eddison Tollett
bio: Eddison Tollett is a brother of the Night's Watch and close friends with Jon Snow, Samwell Tarly, Grenn, and Pypar. Present alongside Jon Snow and the Night's Watch survivors returning to Castle Black after the fight against the White Walkers at Hardhome

name: Olly
bio: He was originally a farm boy at the Gift, but flees to the Night's Watch after his village is attacked by wildlings. Olly finishes Jon off by stabbing him through the chest, ending the mutiny and leaving his Lord Commander dead in the snow.

name: Bowen Marsh
bio: Bowen Marsh is the First Steward of the Night's Watch, in charge of the day-to-day running of it. He takes part in and helps to organize a mutiny against Jon Snow.

name: Othell Yarwyck
bio: Othell Yarwyck is the First Builder; a senior position within the Night's Watch, tasked with organizing the builders in maintaining The Wall. Second person to stab Jon Snow.

name: Wun Wun
bio: He is a wildling Giant who resided at Hardhome before being saved by Jon Snow and taken south of the Wall.  He is more commonly referred to by the other wildlings as "Wun Wun".

name: Sansa Stark
bio: Sansa Stark is the eldest daughter and second child of Lady Catelyn and Lord Eddard Stark. Held captive by Ramsay Bolton as his wife, she has escaped Winterfell with Theon by jumping off one of the walls.

name: Brienne of Tarth
bio: Brienne is the sole surviving child and heir of Lord Selwyn Tarth of Evenfall Hall, on the island of Tarth. She is unusually tall and muscular for a woman by Westerosi standards and developed a taste for martial activity as a child. Brienne has grown up to become skilled at arms and dreams of becoming a knight.

name: Bran Stark
bio: He is the fourth child and second son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark. One of the few characters known to possess magical abilities such as receiving prophetic visions and sending his consciousness into the mind of an animal.

name: Hodor
bio: Hodor is a simpleminded servant of House Stark at Winterfell, currently guardian of Bran Stark, journeying beyond the wall to find the Three-eyed raven appearing in Bran's dreams.

name: Podrick Payne
bio: Podrick Payne was Tyrion Lannister's squire and saved his life in the Battle of the Blackwater, but following Tyrion's arrest for the murder of King Joffrey Baratheon, he has since been given to Brienne of Tarth, who he joins on a quest to find Arya and Sansa Stark.

name: Meera Reed
bio: Meera is the eldest child and only daughter of Lord Howland Reed of Greywater Watch. Her sole sibling is her younger brother Jojen Reed, who was killed by wights. She follows Leaf with Bran and Hodor to meet the three-eyed raven.

name: Osha
bio: Osha is a woman of the Free Folk (or "wildling"), now in service to House Stark of Winterfell. Osha is currently escorting Rickon Stark to Last Hearth to seek refuge with House Umber.

name: Brynden Tully
bio: A respected knight and a member of House Tully. He is the younger brother of Lord Hoster Tully, and the uncle of Catelyn, Lysa, and Edmure Tully. He narrowly escaped the Red Wedding massacre while relieving himself on a tree outside.

name: Rickon Stark
bio: He is the youngest child and third son of Eddard and Catelyn Stark. Currently believed to be dead, but is being escorted by Usha to the Last Hearth to seek refuge with House Umber..

name: Smalljon Umber
bio: Smalljon is the son of Greatjon Umber, the Lord of Last Hearth and proud bannerman of House Stark.

name: Harald Karstark
bio: After the execution of Lord Rickard Karstark by Robb Stark, Harald is the new head of House Karstark and Lord of Karhold. He is described as ruthless and calculating.

name: Edmure Tully
bio: The younger brother of Catelyn and Lysa. He remains a hostage of Lord Frey.

name: Daenerys Targaryen
bio: Mother of Dragons. And: Daenerys of House Targaryen, the First of Her Name, Queen of Meereen, Queen of the Andals, the Rhoynar and the First Men (claimant), Lady Regnant of the Seven Kingdoms (claimant) Protector of the Realm (claimant), Khaleesi of the Great Grass Sea Breaker of Chains.

name: Daario Naharis
bio: The captain of the sellsword company, the Second Sons, and ally to Daenerys Targaryen (+ sexy times). Has departed on horseback with Jorah Mormont to find Daenerys after she was carried off by her dragon.

name: Jorah Mormont
bio: Ser Jorah is an exiled Northern lord living in Essos. He has sworn fealty to his fellow exile Daenerys Targaryen, but also a deep love for Daenerys. Intelligent, literate, well travelled, and a skilled warrior, knowing the histories of Essos and speaking several tongues. Currently attempting to find Daenerys with Daario.

name: Moro
bio: A Dorthraki Khal, briefly appearing in the first novel in which he attends the wedding of Khal Drogo and Daenerys Targaryen.

name: Rhalko
bio: A Dothraki Khal.

name: Forzo
bio: A Dothraki Khal.

name: Ahko
bio: A Dorthraki bloodrider.

name: Qhono
bio: A Dorthraki bloodrider.

name: Margaery Tyrell
bio: Margaery is the only daughter of Lady Alerie Tyrell and Lord Mace Tyrell, the Lord Paramount of the Reach. As beautiful as she is clever, her strength is in her ability to win the minds and loyalties of her subjects, and Kings.

name: Samwell Tarly
bio: Samwell is a steward in the Night's Watch and is Jon Snow's closest friend. He is the eldest son of Lord Randyll Tarly and Lady Melessa Tarly of Horn Hill. Though he is overweight and not the bravest or most skilled of men, he is intelligent, well-educated, and insightful, his vast knowledge serving the Night's Watch in their battles with the forces beyond the Wall.

name: Olenna Tyrell
bio: Queen of Thorns, holding a great deal of influence over the Reach. A widow of Lord Luthor Tyrell. In her youth, Olenna Redwyne was engaged to a member of House Targaryen, as it was "all the rage" at the time; it was her sister Viola whom Luthor Tyrell was expected to marry. The night before Luthor was to propose to Viola, Olenna snuck into his chamber and seduced him, leaving him "unable to walk downstairs" the next day to propose to Viola. Olenna did this because the thought of marrying a Targaryen and his "ludicrous silver hair" did not appeal to her.

name: Loras Tyrell
bio: The son of Lord Mace Tyrell and heir to Highgarden, Loras is a popular tourney knight and ranks as one of the most skilled knights in Westeros. One of the most sought-after bachelors in Westeros, currently in captivity of the Faith Militant due to his homosexuality.

name: Gilly
bio: Gilly is one of the Free Folk, and is a daughter and wife of Craster. In romantic relations with Samwell Tarly.

name: Randyll Tarly
bio: He is the Lord of Horn Hill and the head of House Tarly. He forced his son Samwell Tarly to join the Night's Watch under the threat of death. Fierce, ruthless warrior and a highly effective general.

name: Mace Tyrell
bio: The Lord of Highgarden and head of House Tyrell. He is the father of Loras and Margaery Tyrell, and the son of Olenna Tyrell. Mace might not be the most intelligent man, but he is an amiable fellow well-liked by most of his bannermen, as well a loving husband and father. Currently in Braavos meeting the Iron Bank.

name: Dickon Tarly
bio: The younger brother of Samwell Tarly. He became their father Randyll Tarly's heir after he disinherited Samwell by forcing him to join the Night's Watch. Athletic, a skilled hunter and excellent swordsman, though not particularly bright. Naturally gifted at martial endeavors, he is his father's favorite child.

name: Melessa Tarly
bio: The wife Lord Randyll Tarly of Horn Hill and mother of Samwell Tarly of the Night's Watch.

name: Talla Tarly
bio: Talla is sister of Samwell Tarly, and daughter of Lord Randyll Tarly of Horn Hill.
